## IABGRConvert interface

<b>Signature:</b>


## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fromABGR](./pixel.iabgrconvert.fromabgr.md) | <code>Fn&lt;number, T&gt;</code> | Converts given ABGR value into internal pixel format. |
